contest-event.event-date: Sept. 27, 1924 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship On the Cornish Coast Crystal Palace (Concert Hall), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK Prizes: 1st: 100 Pounds plus the 1000 Guinea Trophy 2nd: 50 Pounds plus the Daily Telegraph Challenge Cup 3rd: 30 Pounds Australian Imperial did not attend as their intended tour did not in fact take place.
